message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. I know it's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe we can reach a better agreement. I am willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,800.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's close this deal!
